directions: In a 6 quart soup pot, combine stew meat, soup bone, barley and carrots.  Cover with water to within 2 inches of top of pot.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 1 hour.
Place onion and celery in pot and continue to simmer 2 hours more.
Remove onion, carrots, bone and celery.  Season with salt and serve.
title: Beef and Barley Soup IV
